pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultibiotic Daily IBS Probiotic 30 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultibiotic Daily IBS Probiotic is a premium quality formula containing Lactobacillus plantarum (299V), a clinically trialled probiotic strain specifically formulated to:



  • Help relieve symptoms – and reduce the ongoing occurrence of symptoms – of medically diagnosed Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)

  • Support bowel regularity, to relieve constipation and diarrhoea

  • Relieve abdominal pain and discomfort, and reduce abdominal bloating

  • Maintain a healthy gastrointestinal system

  • Help promote beneficial intestinal flora.

Size: 30 Pack

Warnings

Drink plenty of water.
If symptoms persist, worsen or episodes become more frequent, consult your medical practitioner.
Do not use when abdominal pain, nausea or vomiting are present or if you develop diarrhoea. Seek medical advice if diarrhoea persists for longer than 48 hours in adults and children over 6 years.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

No added lactose, gluten, yeast, egg, soy, artificial colours or artificial flavours.

Gluten free and dairy free.



Ingredients

EACH CAPSULE CONTAINS:
L. plantarum (299V) 10 billion CFU

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
One capsule daily, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Do not use if cap seal is broken.
